TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
Creates a Dark ritual circle, identifies Dark magic, and serves as resurrection circle for followers of that Deity.
1/ever Spellstrike a significant amount of Dark damage.
Dedicates a creature to the caster's deity and gives them a 1/day "Magic Bless".
Send a short message to your god, they might listen if they like you.
Augments Bless spells to grant an increased level of protection and more notice from your deity.
Augments your Church with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to making your Altar immovable to most.
Can be used to dispel blessing upon the land, protect your flock against possession, or to create a satchel of ashes that Blinds.
Replaces one arm with a shadow limb that can drain life from targets and cannot be bound, lasts for 1 hour or until healed.
Summon a Celestial being to do a task of 10 words or less.
Creates a powerful weapon meant to slay a specific enemy of your Church.
Extends the duration of Dark rituals by 3 months per stack, max 12 months.
Investees can drain the life from a target 1/day.
Sacrifices a sentient being, blessed and willing sentient, or a favored sentient for increasingly strong buffs for your flock.
Silences and suffocates your target, eventually killing them. Stays on your spirit for 10 minutes or until successfully used on a target.
Suffuses an area with unholy Dark magic, causing Dark Spirits from a Divine realm to attack and torment those nearby for 1 hour.
If you hear this and don't have a Blessing of the caster's God, you're blinded for a short time.
Augments your Church with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to granting 15 Mending if you rest for 3 hours within.
A Ritual Dark Bolt that keeping doing half of its damage 1/10 minutes for an hour, and makes the target vulnerable to possession.
Allows the caster to add the Ritual prefix to a single Dark battle magic spell 1/day.
Ask your Deity 3 questions, or request a miracle.
Investees can perform a 10 minute mass to grant up to five followers a flag that grants a +0 Magic threshold for 10 minutes.
Creates a 10ft zone of Darkness that's very hard to see/sense into, silences those without the right blessing, and comes with tentacles.
The caster chooses an Acolyte, they can share in 1 self-cast battle magic spell per day and gain 1 Dark battle magic spell per day, which the caster loses.
Enchants a weapon to swing Magic for day, gain strength from Killing Blows, and comes with a Spellstrike Dark Bolt.
Aura that sits on your spirit, when activated you swing +1 Dark for an hour.
Corrupt a Light/Draconic magic item and turn it into something more suitable for a Dark worshiper.
Teleport form one large shadow to another large shadow that's within your line of sight.
Augments your Church with 4 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to 1/minute Alchemical Blindness packets.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Dark rituals.
Plant your feet and throw 10 Dark until you move, get dropped, or are dispelled.
1/day Ritual Divine Ward on the circle, note this is 1 per circle, not 1 per investee.
Teleport to the Divine Realm, then back to your Dark ritual circle.
Dark-based armour that lasts for 1 hour and comes with a bunch of abilities, such as a +0 Magic threshold.
Dark-based armour that lasts for 1 hour and comes with a bunch of abilities, such as effectively a Karmic Ricochet for Draconic/Light.
Dark-based armour that lasts for 1 hour and comes with a bunch of abilities, such as a Dodge that also lets you take 3 steps OOG.
Augments your Church with 5 additional abilities/effects, including but not limited to allowing Dark favored to Reset instantly within.
Turns 1/ever Dark ritual effects into 1/day effects.
The Target becomes immune to Life effects for the next hour, ouch!
Stops any single packet-delivered, boffer, or touch attack. You can only have one.
Everyone who hears this call and doesn't have the right Bless takes a Magic Death.
Keeps a powerful enchanted weapon that anyone can use mounted in the circle, you can break the glass over it for an hour during emergencies.
Begins the process of making an exceptionally powerful Relic enchanted with Dark magic.
This Angel is bigger than the last one.
Turns a Dark ritual circle into a hoop for easy transport.
A Power Word Directed Ritual Death that turns a finalled creature into a temporary and vengeful Dark spirit that serves the caster's Deity.
Creates a tunnel of Dark magic that phases out other barriers both magical and physical, really hurts those without the right Bless.
